languages.text: "У тебя что-то с визорами, Паскаль, вот и мерещится всякое. Я в порядке — полном".
"Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."
languages.original_text: "У тебя что-то с визорами, Паскаль, вот и мерещится всякое. Я в порядке — полном".

traits.locale_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."
"Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."
"Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am... perfectly fine."
"Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am... perfectly fine."
"Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."
"Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

languages.text: 「パスカル、お前のバイザーに何か問題があるに違いない。お前は何かを勘違いしている。俺はまったく問題ない」
languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、お前のバイザーに何か問題があるに違いない。お前は何かを勘違いしている。俺はまったく問題ない」

languages.text: "Mit Euren Visoren stimmt etwas nicht, Pasqal – Ihr habt Halluzinationen. Mir geht es blendend."
languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Euren Visoren stimmt etwas nicht, Pasqal – Ihr habt Halluzinationen. Mir geht es blendend."

languages.text: «Debe de fallar algo en sus visores, Pasqal. Se lo está imaginando. Estoy perfectamente».
languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

traits.locale_text: «Debe de fallar algo en sus visores, Pasqal. Se lo está imaginando. Estoy perfectamente».

languages.text: “你的面甲恐怕是出问题了，帕斯卡。你在胡思乱想，我一点事情都没有。”
languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

traits.locale_text: “你的面甲恐怕是出问题了，帕斯卡。你在胡思乱想，我一点事情都没有。”

languages.text: "Vizörlerinde bir sıkıntı olsa gerek Pasqal. Hayal görüyorsun, ben gayet iyi durumdayım."
languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

traits.locale_text: "Vizörlerinde bir sıkıntı olsa gerek Pasqal. Hayal görüyorsun, ben gayet iyi durumdayım."

languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

languages.text: « Quelque chose doit clocher avec vos visières, Pasqal. Vous vous faites des idées. Je vais parfaitement bien. »
languages.original_text: "Something must be wrong with your visors, Pasqal — you are imagining things. I am perfectly fine."

traits.locale_text: « Quelque chose doit clocher avec vos visières, Pasqal. Vous vous faites des idées. Je vais parfaitement bien. »
